channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Cursor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Cursor

item.title: CVE-2017-8466|2024-08-05T16:34:23.214Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20cursor
item.description: Windows Cursor in Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, and Windows Server 2016 allows improper elevation of privilege, aka "Windows Cursor Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".
